item.title: 小唐纳德-特朗普持有的 GrabAGun 公司股份下跌 25% 后仍价值 400 万美元
item.description: 小唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump Jr.）周三在距离特朗普组织华尔街 40 号大楼几步之遥的地方，庆祝一家枪支零售商的开业，这家零售商的开业使他的财富增加了 400 万美元。【原文：Steps away from the Trump Organization’s 40 Wall Street building, Donald Trump Jr. on Wednesday heralded the debut of a gun retailer that made him $4 million richer.】

item.title: 日本芯片制造商 Kioxia 首次交易出售 22 亿美元债券
item.description: 芯片制造商 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 在其首次公司债券发行中出售了 22 亿美元的美国垃圾债券，成为最新一家进军海外信贷市场的日本公司。【原文：Chipmaker Kioxia Holdings Corp. sold $2.2 billion of US junk bonds in its first corporate debt issuance, becoming the latest Japanese firm to storm overseas credit markets.】

item.title: 特朗普试图解雇鲍威尔的 "可信威胁 "引发市场震荡
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统再次展示了他撼动全球金融市场的力量。这一次，他回到了自己最喜欢的话题之一：是否解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔。【原文：Once again, President Donald Trump demonstrated his power to shake up global financial markets. This time, by returning to one of his favorite topics: whether to fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 在政府支持下，蒙特利尔机场计划耗资 73 亿美元进行改造
item.description: 蒙特利尔-皮埃尔-埃利奥特-特鲁多国际机场将在未来十年斥资 100 亿加元（约合 73 亿美元）对其设施进行现代化改造和扩建。【原文：Montreal-Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport will spend as much as C$10 billion ($7.3 billion) over the next decade to modernize and expand its facilities.】

item.title: 美联储《米色报告》显示美国经济活动略有增长
item.description: 美联储在其《米色手册》（Beige Book）地区商业联系人调查报告中称，美国经济活动在 5 月底至 7 月初期间 "略有增长"。【原文：US economic activity “increased slightly” between late May and early July, the Federal Reserve said in its Beige Book survey of regional business contacts.】

item.title: 亚马逊数据中心建设导致 2024 年排放量攀升 6
item.description: 2024 年，亚马逊公司的碳排放量出现了三年来的首次增长，主要原因是数据中心的建设和其快递供应商的燃料消耗。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s carbon emissions rose for the first time in three years in 2024, driven by data center construction and fuel consumption by its delivery providers.】

item.title: Cerba 医疗保健银行在与债权人谈判前进行债务交易
item.description: 出售 Cerba Healthcare SACA 银行贷款的一部分，标志着贷款人正在寻求在债务谈判开始前减少对这家法国实验室企业的风险敞口。【原文：The sale of a piece of a Cerba Healthcare SACA bank loan signals lenders are seeking to trim their exposure to the French laboratories business before the start of debt talks.】

item.title: 西班牙大停电调查显示欧盟电网需要更强的抗灾能力
item.description: 根据欧洲电力传输系统运营商网络的一份报告，对今年早些时候西班牙大范围停电事件的初步调查结果显示，欧洲电网需要提高抗灾能力。【原文：Preliminary findings of an investigation into a wide-ranging blackout in Spain earlier this year show that European power grids need to improve resilience, according to a report from the European Network of Transmission System Operators for Electricity.】

item.title: 斯托尔滕贝格称挪威和美国在关税谈判中 "气氛融洽
item.description: 挪威财政部长表示，挪威正在解决与美国贸易谈判中的 "一些实际问题"，其目标仍然是防止提高关税。【原文：Norway is addressing “some real issues” in its trade talks with the US and still aims to prevent increases in tariffs, according to the country’s finance minister.】

item.title: 哈根达斯生产商为向业主支付 44 亿欧元债务定价
item.description: 哈根达斯冰淇淋生产商 Froneri International Ltd. 正在完成债务交易承诺，以帮助为有史以来最大的一次股东派息提供资金，因为其私募股权共同所有者希望更长久地持有公司股份。【原文：Froneri International Ltd., the maker of Häagen-Dazs ice cream, is wrapping up commitments for a debt deal to help fund one of the largest shareholder payouts on record, as its private equity co-owner looks to keep its stake in the company for longer.】

item.title: 超额认购交易后 Aura Minerals 首次登陆美国市场，股价涨跌不一
item.description: Aura Minerals 公司在纽约上市融资 1.96 亿美元后，其股票在美国首次交易中与发行价相比变化不大。【原文：Aura Minerals Inc. shares were little changed from the offer price in a US trading debut, after the gold and copper miner raised $196 million in a listing in New York.】

item.title: 乌克兰网络部队仍未获得美国安全资助
item.description: 2023 年 6 月 20 日星期二，Kyivstar GSM 首席执行官 Oleksandr Komarov 在英国伦敦接受彭博电视采访。"科马洛夫说："我们认为这是我们社会责任的一部分：建设、投资、恢复，并以某种方式做出表率。摄影师：克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Oleksandr Komarov, chief executive officer of Kyivstar GSM, during a Bloomberg Television interview in London, UK, on Tuesday, June 20, 2023. "We feel that this is part of our social responsibility: to build, to invest, to recover, and somehow to give an example," Komarov said. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: GameStop 的 "Staplegate "Switch 2 在拍卖会上拍得 25 万美元
item.description: 这可能会造成营销混乱。【原文：It could have been a marketing mess.】

item.title: 市场氛围好到不能再好了
item.description: 如果说 7 月份是股市的关键考验，那么到目前为止，情况还不错。乐观的盈利、失业救济人数减少、通胀率仍低于 3%，以及新通过的减税政策，所有这些因素加在一起，使市场持续走高。但这是最好的结果吗？【原文：If July is the stock market’s critical test, then so far, so good. Upbeat earnings, lower jobless claims, inflation still under 3% and newly passed tax cuts have all combined to keep the market grinding higher. But is this as good as it gets?】

item.title: 荷兰政府放弃 "不切实际 "的海上风电目标
item.description: 荷兰政府认为到 2040 年实现 50 千兆瓦发电能力的目标不再可行，因此将把海上风力发电的目标削减多达 40%。【原文：The Netherlands will slash its offshore wind ambitions by as much as 40% as the government no longer finds it viable to aim for 50 gigawatts of generation capacity by 2040.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 的鲁布纳在劳动节前看好股市
item.description: Citadel 证券公司股票和股票衍生品策略主管斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）周三表示，在季节性因素合谋导致美股下跌之前，美股多头可望在劳动节假期中稳健运行。【原文：US stock bulls can expect a solid run into the Labor Day holiday before seasonal factors conspire to deliver a rockier fall, Citadel Securities’ head of equity and equity derivatives strategy Scott Rubner said Wednesday.】

item.title: 卡冈亚戈认为尽管存在风险，南非消费物价指数仍将保持在目标范围内
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞特贾-克甘亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，尽管美国关税带来了不确定性，但南非有信心在未来两年将通胀率保持在目标范围内。【原文：South Africa’s central bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago signaled confidence that inflation would remain within its target for the next two years, despite uncertainties stemming from US tariffs.】

item.title: 石门债券暴跌，酒吧评级跌至垃圾级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将这家英国酒吧公司的评级下调一级，降至 Caa1，理由是预计盈利将减弱，成本压力将上升。【原文：Stonegate’s bonds slid after Moody’s Ratings downgraded the UK pub company one step to Caa1, citing an anticipated weakening in earnings and rising cost pressures.】

item.title: 改革威胁在拍卖前取消英国风电合同
item.description: 英国改革党正威胁风能开发商，如果他们赢得下届大选，将在关键拍卖前取消未来的补贴。【原文：Reform UK is threatening wind developers with the future cancellation of subsidies in the lead up to a key auction, should they win the next election.】

item.title: 谷歌将于 8 月 20 日发布以人工智能为核心的新款 Pixel 硬件
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司将于8月20日在纽约举行的一次活动上首次推出新的Pixel品牌硬件，预计阵容将包括几款智能手机和一款智能手表，所有产品都将采用该公司的人工智能技术。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google will debut new Pixel-branded hardware at an event on Aug. 20 in New York, with the lineup expected to include several smartphones and a smartwatch, all powered by the company’s artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 据说 EDF 正在权衡出售区域供热业务 Dalkia 的各种方案
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）正在权衡各种方案，其中包括出售部分或全部法国地区供热和制冷业务，因为该公司正专注于加强其核电机组和电网。【原文：Electricite de France SA is weighing options that include selling some or all of its French district heating and cooling business as the utility focuses on fortifying its nuclear fleet and the power grid, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 比特币耶稣 "就税务案起诉西班牙阻止美国引渡
item.description: 被称为 "比特币耶稣 "的加密货币倡导者罗杰-维尔（Roger Ver）起诉西班牙，要求阻止将其引渡到美国，以面临逃税指控。【原文：Roger Ver, the cryptocurrency advocate known as “Bitcoin Jesus,” has sued Spain to block his extradition to the US to face tax evasion charges.】

item.title: 期权交易员押注台积电业绩后股价将扩大涨幅
item.description: 期权交易商押注台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Options traders are betting that Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s stock rally has more to run as optimism grows that its upcoming earnings will alleviate market concerns.】

item.title: 加拿大将限制钢铁进口以减轻特朗普关税的打击
item.description: 加拿大将减少进口商可以免关税进口的外国钢材数量，此举旨在帮助因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对该行业征税而遭受损失的国内生产商。【原文：Canada will reduce the amount of foreign steel that importers can bring in tariff-free, a move to help domestic producers suffering from US President Donald Trump’s levies on the sector.】

item.title: 量子资本称 60 美元左右的油价是利润红区
item.description: 据页岩地区私人运营商的最大投资者之一称，美国油田的开采活动正在放缓，因为钻探者的利润仍处于原油价格的危险区。【原文：Activity is slowing in US oil fields as drillers remain in the crude-price danger zone for profits, according to one of the biggest investors of private operators in the shale patch.】

item.title: 特朗普可能解雇鲍威尔的报道引发美国国债大涨
item.description: 一位白宫官员称，唐纳德-特朗普总统可能很快解雇美联储主席，随后短期美国国债跳涨，美元大跌。【原文：Short-maturity US Treasuries jumped and the dollar plunged after a White House official said President Donald Trump is likely to fire the chief of the Federal Reserve soon.】

item.title: 丰业银行称，卡尼应禁止美国公司将项目作为贸易杠杆
item.description: 加拿大新斯科舍银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）的一位经济学家表示，加拿大应考虑将美国公司排除在大型基础设施和国防项目之外，以此作为对特朗普政府一系列关税措施的回应。【原文：Canada should consider excluding US companies from major infrastructure and defense projects as part of its response to the Trump administration’s barrage of tariffs, according to a Bank of Nova Scotia economist.】

item.title: Meta 投资后，Scale AI 将裁员 14
item.description:
这家人工智能数据标签公司正在裁减200名全职员工，并将停止与500名承包商的合作。【原文：

The AI data-labeling company is laying off 200 full-time employees and will stop working with 500 contractors. 

】

item.title: Eurazeo 成长基金在首次收盘中获得 6.5 亿欧元，用于人工智能投注
item.description: 欧洲投资集团Eurazeo SE在其最新增长基金首次关闭时筹集了6.5亿欧元（约合7.52亿美元）资金，这可能会推动该地区科技公司在人工智能推动下的融资复苏。【原文：European investment group Eurazeo SE has raised €650 million ($752 million) at the first close of its latest growth fund, potentially adding to an AI-fueled recovery in funding for the region’s tech firms.】

item.title: 白宫官员称特朗普可能很快解雇鲍威尔
item.description: 一位白宫官员表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统很可能很快解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔，并在周二晚与国会共和党人会面时讨论了这一可能的举动。【原文：President Donald Trump is likely to fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell soon, a White House official said, and discussed the possible move in a meeting with congressional Republicans on Tuesday night.】
